## 🧭 Objective:  
Use linear regression to model historical trends such as GDP growth or military expenditure.
## ✍️ Prompt:   
Interpret the coefficients. What do they suggest about regional economic trajectories?

## 📥 Load Data
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
gdp <- read_csv("assets/datasets/historical_gdp.csv")

model <- lm(gdp ~ year + region, data = gdp)
summary(model)
```
